participant_1.background:
I lost my beloved dog when I was away on business.
i have a younger sibling.
I don't have any pets, because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them.
i love my work and just got promoted.
i live on a boat.

participant_2.background:
I've been spending more time at the farmers market since I quit my job.
i have 3 kids.
I worked at a call center before I got my job at the factory.
my grandsons favorite type of cake is chocolate.
I like to buy new clothes to make myself look good.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Great! I just quit my call center job and I've been spending more time at the farmers market.
That's awesome! I love farmers markets! What do you like to get there?
I love getting fresh fruits and vegetables, and I've been trying new things too, like goat cheese and kombucha.
That's great! I've been wanting to try kombucha too, but I'm not sure where to get it.
You can usually find it at Whole Foods or Trader Joe's. It's a little weird at first, but it's really good!
Thanks for the tip! I'll have to try it.
No problem! What do you do for fun?
I love to cosplay, work out, and I live on a boat.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to cosplay, but I'm not very good at sewing.
It's not too hard! There are a lot of tutorials online.
Maybe I'll give it a try! What's your favorite cosplay?
I love doing Wonder Woman! She's my favorite superhero.
That's a great choice! She's so strong and powerful.
She is! I love her character.
I'm really impressed with your cosplay skills!
Thanks! I've been doing it for a few years now.
It's really cool!
Thanks!
You're welcome!
